### Speakers  
Holly J. Falk-Krzesinski (VP of Research Intelligence & Co-chair of the Gender Working Group, Elsevier)

Holly J. Falk-Krzesinski, VP of Research Intelligence & Co-chair of the Gender Working Group at Elsevier discussed the Gender in Global Research Report as well as her experiences working in Science Policy.
